Summary: five orbs. three in triangle. two circling below. hovered over horizon. drifted out of sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was moving my car and looked up to see five hovering lights They were orange and red. Three were at top in triangle pattern and two hovered below spinning in circles. They slowly drifted up and away over the horizon and out of sight. I was certain they were not airplanes or helicopters. Felt immediately that they were UFO. My heart jumped.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
